coreQueryPageProvider.name: wc_document_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:fulltext LIKE '?*' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:isProxy = 0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: cad_bom_wc_document_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:fulltext LIKE '?*' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:mixinType IN ('CadDocument', 'BomDocument')

coreQueryPageProvider.name: cad_wc_document_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:fulltext LIKE '?*' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:mixinType = 'CadDocument'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: bom_wc_document_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:fulltext LIKE '?*' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:mixinType = 'BomDocument'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: workspace_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Workspace WHERE ecm:fulltext LIKE '?*' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:isProxy = 0

coreQueryPageProvider.name: structure_root_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM StructureRoot WHERE ecm:fulltext LIKE '?*' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'
